yuiNavSteps.configurationDescr: Configure the system and select an application.

prompts.systemTooltip: Select a system to load its application list.
prompts.usernameTooltip: Enter the user name for the back-end system.
prompts.passwordTooltip: Enter the password for the back-end system.
prompts.applicationListTooltip: Select the application for which you want to create an app variant.
prompts.fioriIdHint: This is an one-time, semantic identifier for the app variant. The Fiori ID will be shown in the 'About' section of the app for ease of identification and will also be available in the Fiori Apps Reference Library.
prompts.achHint: The purpose of ACH components is to enable the support organization to indicate which BCP/ticket component might be responsible for a particular issue.
prompts.adpNotSupported: Note: The selected application is not supported by SAPUI5 Adaptation Project.
prompts.createExtProjectLabel: The selected application is not supported by the SAPUI5 Adaptation Project. For more information, see SAPUI5 Adaptation Project documentation. Do you want to create an extension project instead?
prompts.createExtProjectWithSyncViewsLabel: Do you want to create an extension project instead? An extension project gives you the ability to create controller extensions for synchronous and asynchronous views.
prompts.createExtProjectContinueLabel: Please select whether you want to continue.
prompts.projectNameTooltip: Enter the project name for your app variant.
prompts.appTitleTooltip: Enter the application title for your app variant.
prompts.ui5VersionTooltip: Select the SAPUI5 version you want to use to preview your app variant.
prompts.appInfoLabel: Synchronous views are detected for this application. Therefore, the controller extensions are not supported. Controller extension functionality on these views will be disabled.
prompts.notSupportedAdpOverAdpLabel: You have selected 'Adaptation Project' as the base. The selected system has a SAPUI5 version lower than 1.90. Therefore, it does not support 'Adaptation Project' as а base for a new adaptation project. You will be able to create such а project, but after deployment it will not work until the SAPUI5 version of the system is updated.
prompts.isPartiallySupportedAdpOverAdpLabel: You have selected 'Adaptation Project' as the base. The selected system has a SAPUI5 version lower than 1.96 and in order for your adaptation project based on adaptation project to work after deployment, you will need to apply SAP Note 756 SP0 on your system.
prompts.v4AppNotOfficialLabel: You have selected an app based on SAP Fiori elements for OData V4. Note the following important information when you create adaptation changes: https://wiki.wdf.sap.corp/wiki/display/fioritech/Adaptation+Project+Support
prompts.projectNameLengthErrorExt: The name cannot contain more than 61 characters or end with the word 'component'.
prompts.projectNameValidationErrorExt: The name must contain only latin alphanumeric characters. Different parts can be separated by a period and every part must start with a letter.
prompts.projectNameLengthErrorInt: The name cannot start with the word 'customer', or contain more than 61 characters, or end with the word 'component'.
prompts.projectNameValidationErrorInt: The name must contain only latin alphanumeric characters and it must have at least two parts. The different parts must be separated by a period and every part must start with a letter.

error.writingPhase: An error occurred in the writing phase of the adaptation project generation. To see the error, view the logs.
error.telemetry: An error occurred when sending telemetry data: {{- error}}. To see the error, view the logs.
error.updatingApp: An error occurred when creating a new adaptation project. To see the error, view the logs.
error.cloudSystemsForInternalUsers: You have selected a system that does not support On-Premise adaptation projects. Please select a supported system.
error.notDeployableNotFlexEnabledSystemError: The system that you have selected is not an ABAP On-Premise system. Adaptation projects are only supported on those systems. Please choose an ABAP On-Premise system which supports flexibility and DTA_FOLDER deployment.
error.notDeployableSystemError: The system that you have selected is not an ABAP On-Premise system which supports DTA_FOLDER deployment. Adaptation projects are only supported on those systems. Please choose an ABAP On-Premise system which supports DTA_FOLDER deployment.
error.notFlexEnabledError: The system that you have selected is not an ABAP On-Premise system which supports flexibility. Adaptation projects are only supported on those systems. Please choose an ABAP On-Premise system which supports flexibility. If you continue, you will only be able to create an extension project.
error.manifestCouldNotBeValidated: The manifest.json file of the selected application could not be validated. Please select a different application.
error.appDoesNotSupportAdaptation: The selected application does not support flexibility. The SAPUI5 Adaptation Project is only available for applications that support flexibility. Please select a different application.
error.appDoesNotSupportManifest: The selected application is not supported by the adaptation project. Please select a different application. For more information, see SAPUI5 Adaptation Project documentation.
error.extensibilityGenNotFound: Extensibility Project generator plugin was not found in your dev space, and is required for this action. To proceed, please install the <SAPUI5 Layout Editor & Extensibility> extension.
error.creatingExtensionProjectError: Creating the extension project failed. To see the error, view the logs.
error.appParameterMissing: Could not create an extension project because the application parameters are missing. Please select a different application.
error.destinationInfoMissing: Could not create an extension project because the destination info is missing. Please select a different system.
